Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • axispar - Specify axis and scaling parameters (pset for 'sgraph')
  • catlim - Specify star catalog limits (pset for 'skymap').
  • colnames - Specify star catalog column names (pset for 'skymap').
  • dvpar - Specify device parameters (pset).
  • fieldplot - Graph vector field.
  • grlist - Parse a group format image section.
  • grplot - Overplot several images from a group format file.
  • grspec - Interactively plot several images from a group format file.
  • histogram - Plot or list the histogram of a table column, image, or list.
  • igi - Interactive Graphics Interpreter.
  • newcont - Draw contours of two-dimensional data.
  • pltpar - Specify graph parameters (pset for 'sgraph').
  • psikern - IRAF GIO Kernel to produce PostScript output.
  • rc - Interactively label a plot with text strings.
  • sgraph - Graph one or more image sections or lists.
  • skymap - Draw a star chart.
  • siaper - Plot the science instrument apertures of HST.
  • wcslab - Produce sky projection grids for images.
  • wlpars - Pset to specify characteristics of WCS labelled graphs.
  • wcspars - Pset to specify a WCS.

  • (Type "help stplot option=sysdoc" for detailed information about 'stplot').
